name: Jumping Guns - 2 Players Shooting Game
description:
Jumping Guns - 2 players shooting game with simple gameplay:
- Jump to avoid bullet and have a better shot at your opponent
- Shoot to simple shoot at your opponent
- Avoid the bomb
- Shoot at the health power up to increase health


Hint: Try to jump and shoot immediately. If your opponent doesn’t jump, he will regret it :D
